items.question: How accurate are the auto-generated tags?
items.answer: Our AI provides high accuracy in tag generation. Continuous improvement through machine learning ensures relevance to your product catalog.

items.question: Can I edit the automatically generated tags?
items.answer: Yes! After AI processing, you can review and modify the tags to fit your specific needs.

items.question: What types of images work best for tagging?
items.answer: Clear, well-lit product images yield the best results for accurate tagging. The AI can also work with a variety of product types.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of images I can upload?
items.answer: No! You can upload as many images as you need for tagging. The system handles batch uploads seamlessly.

items.question: Do I need to provide descriptions or context for tagging?
items.answer: No, the AI analyzes the image independently to generate relevant tags, making the process incredibly efficient.

items.question: What if I have a large inventory?
items.answer: Our solution scales effectively, allowing efficient tagging for extensive product listings without slowing down.

items.question: How quickly can I expect my images to be tagged?
items.answer: Tagging typically occurs in seconds per image, allowing you to update your listings in real time.

items.question: What are the commercial rights for auto-generated tags?
items.answer: You retain full rights to use, modify, and apply the tags in any manner for your business.

items.question: What support resources are available?
items.answer: We provide documentation, tutorials, and customer support to help you maximize your tagging efficiency.
